neuralNet

Class MnistMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • neuralNet.MnistMatrix

  • public final class MnistMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Auxiliar data structure to hold in a matrix the MNIST data read with MnistDataReader.
